about_the_game:
SUPER 3-D CRUNK BROS. is an action-adventure platformer. Join Crunk and Paco on their quest to thwart the plans of Dr. N. Dows, C.E.O. of the Lufa Corporation. Their latest business venture, the release of the TurboChin, will be their most impactful; striking consumers in such a way the company has never before seen. Will LufaCorp follow through with their plans? Or can this greasy gang save the day? Find out in SUPER 3-D CRUNK BROS.!

Features:

  • Original soundtrack composed by Sigmuuu
  • Graphics and gameplay elements inspired by games and media from the past
  • 8 worlds each containing intricate and interesting level designs, and boss fights
  • A large cast of eccentric characters
  • Time trial and challenge modes
  • Native 4:3 display and gamepad support
detailed_description:
SUPER 3-D CRUNK BROS. is an action-adventure platformer. Join Crunk and Paco on their quest to thwart the plans of Dr. N. Dows, C.E.O. of the Lufa Corporation. Their latest business venture, the release of the TurboChin, will be their most impactful; striking consumers in such a way the company has never before seen. Will LufaCorp follow through with their plans? Or can this greasy gang save the day? Find out in SUPER 3-D CRUNK BROS.!

Features:

  • Original soundtrack composed by Sigmuuu
  • Graphics and gameplay elements inspired by games and media from the past
  • 8 worlds each containing intricate and interesting level designs, and boss fights
  • A large cast of eccentric characters
  • Time trial and challenge modes
  • Native 4:3 display and gamepad support
legal_notice: This video game "SUPER 3-D CRUNK BROS." is entirely fictitious. Any similarity to the history of any person living or dead, or any actual events is entirely coincidental and unintentional. Except where specifically noted otherwise in the game credits or store page description, all celebrity voices are impersonated, and no celebrities have endorsed any aspect of this video game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL capable graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit libraries may be required. Hi P.D.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: G4 Cube not supported

short_description: SUPER 3-D CRUNK BROS. is an action-adventure platformer which tells the tale of a hash brown named Crunk, his "brother" Paco, and their journey to thwart the plans of a nefarious corporation bent on taking over the world.
